text:
Situation A. Looking for the Line of Reflection

Zack created a pentagon to use in the video game. He reflected pentagon ABCDE over a line to create its image A′B′C′D′E′. But he did not keep track of his line of reflection.

tiles.title: He reflected pentagon ABCDE over a line to create its image A′B′C′D′E′. But he did not keep track of his line of reflection.

text:
1. How could you find the line of reflection, m?

2. Is the relationship between a point and its image and the line of reflection the same as you found in the Initial Challenge? Explain.

1. Is this possible? If so, create the image of each figure over the given line of reflection.

2. Label the image points as J’K’L’M’, A’B’C’D’E’, or V’W’X’Y’Z’.

Situation C. Marta’s Conjecture

Is her conjecture true? Explain.
